main event: A UFO sighting was reported on August 20, 1965, near Plattsburgh AFB, New York.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 3 minutes,The object was tracked by GCA radar while simultaneously being observed visually,The object exhibited intermittent maneuvers, moving higher and lower and altering its course,It accelerated rapidly to the east at a speed estimated between Mach 1.5 and 2,The object was described as round, flat, disc-shaped with an estimated diameter of 15-20 ft.
witness description: Major, USAF with over 4,200 flight hours and 20 years of active duty
